parameters.name: Host
parameters.description: The endpoint of the database instance. You can call the [ListInstances](~~141936~~) or [GetInstance](~~141567~~) operation to obtain the endpoint.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port number that is used to connect to the database instance. You can call the [ListInstances](~~141936~~) or [GetInstance](~~141567~~) operation to obtain the port number.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The system ID (SID) of the database instance. You can call the [ListInstances](~~141936~~) or [GetInstance](~~141567~~) operation to obtain the SID.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.
